comments.author: Harkorede
comments.body: Quote from: igehhh on July 21, 2022, 11:23:05 AMStill open?I'd supposed so, provided you didn't participate in the first round.. The team are working on making the casino as user friendly as possible hence the reason for opening another round of review for users that didn't participate in the first round. Thread would have been locked if it weren't or at least it would have been stated.
